content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5) and offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure that a pipe group exists before attempting to connect entities using pipes.
### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the pipe can be placed between the entities before attempting to place it.
### Errors due to entity status
- Ensure that the entities are in a working state (NOT_CONNECTED) before attempting to use them.
